acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These advertisements were given to the University of Virginia Library by Fred Zentner, Cinema Bookshop, London, England, through Matthew Bruccoli, on November 8, 1995.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the Joseph M. Bruccoli Great War Collection consists of six film advertisements from Kinematograph Weekly, 1924-1928, and the 1930 Programme of Butcher's Empire Pictures film service, both featuring films portraying the Great War. Some of the films advertised include: Zeebrugge, Poppies of Flanders, The Patent Leather Kid, Vimy Ridge, Motherland, Victory, and The Cockney Spirit in the War.
